page.title: 16WORTHEN GROUP FOUR PROJECT
page.content: Group Four is the name give to a co-operation scheme involving the four local schools, Minsterley, Hope, Stiperstones, and Worthen. Although separate schools the four schools join together for the benefit of the children when this seems most appropriate. Areas covered include games, sports, drama, swimming, music, and environmental activities. All the children from the youngest to the oldest are involved in some part of the programme, and the facilities of every school are used as needed. This scheme has been in operation since 1977. When competitive activities are undertaken the children compete for a team rather than their own school - red, green, blue, and yellow. Each child remains in that team throughout its Group Four time.
